when.if: AND (BZPT_DIV = #{bzpt_div} OR EXISTS (SELECT 'Y' FROM TB_EVLT_TRPR_INFO TI, TB_USER TU, TB_CONS_TEAM TT WHERE TI.TRPR_ID = TU.USER_ID AND TI.CNTR_CD = TU.CNTR_CD AND TU.TEAM_CD = TT.TEAM_CD AND TU.CNTR_CD = TT.CNTR_CD AND TT.BZPT_DIV = #{bzpt_div} AND TI.EVLT_PLAN_ID = A.EVLT_PLAN_ID AND TI.CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD ))

mapper.select: SELECT /* EvltPlanMap.getEvltPlanCount */ COUNT(*) FROM TB_EVLT_PLAN A

SELECT /* EvltPlanMap.getEvltPlanList */ A.* FROM (SELECT
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${orderDirection}) AS PAGE_INDX
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AMNT_DTTM DESC) AS PAGE_INDX
, A.* FROM (SELECT A.* , A.EVLT_PRGR_STAT_CD AS OLD_EVLT_PRGR_STAT_CD , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EVLP_INFO WHERE EVLT_PLAN_ID = A.EVLT_PLAN_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS EVLP_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EVLT_TRPR_INFO WHERE EVLT_PLAN_ID = A.EVLT_PLAN_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS EVLT_TRPR_CNT
, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EVLT_TRPR_INFO TI, TB_USER TU, TB_CONS_TEAM TT WHERE TI.TRPR_ID = TU.USER_ID AND TI.CNTR_CD = TU.CNTR_CD AND TU.TEAM_CD = TT.TEAM_CD AND TU.CNTR_CD = TT.CNTR_CD AND TT.BZPT_DIV = #{bzpt_div} AND TI.EVLT_PLAN_ID = A.EVLT_PLAN_ID AND TI.CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS BZPT_TRPR_CNT
, 0 AS BZPT_TRPR_CNT
, (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT EVLP_ID FROM TB_EVLP_INFO WHERE EVLT_PLAN_ID = A.EVLT_PLAN_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) ) AS EVLP_NM , (SELECT DECODE(EVST_NM, NULL, '미등록', EVST_NM || ' (문항수 : ' || EVLT_QSIT_CNT || ' , 총점 : ' || EVLT_TOTL_SCR || ')') FROM TB_EVST_DTL WHERE EVST_ID = A.EVST_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS EVST_NM , GETCODENM('EVL010', A.EVLT_PRGR_STAT_CD, A.CNTR_CD) AS EVLT_PRGR_STAT_NM , (CASE WHEN A.DIST_END_DT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS DIST_YN , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RGSR_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS RGSR_NM , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.AMND_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS AMND_NM FROM (SELECT A.* FROM TB_EVLT_PLAN A
) A ) A ) A
WHERE PAGE_INDX >= #{startLine} AND PAGE_INDX < #{endLine}
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'EPI' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(SEQ_COMMON.NEXTVAL, 7, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT /* EvltPlanMap.insertEvltPlan */ INTO TB_EVLT_PLAN (EVLT_PLAN_ID, EVLT_BAS_YRMN, EVST_ID, EVLT_PLAN_NM, DIST_END_DT , GOAL_CALL_CNT, EVLT_PRGR_STAT_CD, CNTR_CD, RGSR_ID, RGSN_DTTM , AMND_ID, AMNT_DTTM, BZPT_DIV) VALUES (#{evlt_plan_id}, #{evlt_bas_yrmn}, #{evst_id}, #{evlt_plan_nm}, #{dist_end_dt} , #{goal_call_cnt}, #{evlt_prgr_stat_cd}, #{cntr_cd}, #{rgsr_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{amnd_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{bzpt_div})
mapper.select: SELECT /* EvltPlanMap.getUserFinishCount */ A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NM , (GOAL_CALL_CNT - USER_CNT) AS RE_COUNT FROM (SELECT EVLP_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.EVLP_ID) AS USER_NM , (SELECT GOAL_CALL_CNT FROM TB_EVLT_PLAN WHERE EVLT_PLAN_ID = A.EVLT_PLAN_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS GOAL_CALL_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EVLT_RESL_DTL WHERE EVLT_PLAN_ID = A.EVLT_PLAN_ID AND EVLP_ID = A.EVLP_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD AND EVLT_RESL_STAT_CD = '30') AS USER_CNT FROM TB_EVLP_INFO A WHERE EVLT_PLAN_ID = #{evlt_plan_id} ) A ) A WHERE RE_COUNT > 0

when.if: AND (BZPT_DIV = #{bzpt_div} OR EXISTS (SELECT 'Y' FROM TB_EVLT_TRPR_INFO TI, TB_USER TU, TB_CONS_TEAM TT WHERE TI.TRPR_ID = TU.USER_ID AND TI.CNTR_CD = TU.CNTR_CD AND TU.TEAM_CD = TT.TEAM_CD AND TU.CNTR_CD = TT.CNTR_CD AND TT.BZPT_DIV = #{bzpt_div} AND TI.EVLT_PLAN_ID = A.EVLT_PLAN_ID AND TI.CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD ))

if.test: stt_dt != null and stt_dt != '' and end_dt != null and end_dt != ''

mapper.select: SELECT /* EvltPlanMap.getmonitoringCount */ COUNT(*) FROM TB_MONITORING_ADMIN A

SELECT /* EvltPlanMap.getmonitoringList */ A.* FROM (SELECT
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${orderDirection}) AS PAGE_INDX
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MID desc) AS PAGE_INDX
, A.* FROM (SELECT A.SEQ ,A.SCODE ,A.CNTR_cD ,A.GUBUN ,A.UBIT ,A.JBIT ,A.JDATE ,A.ACCNT_NO ,A.BIGO ,A.MBIGO ,A.GBIGO ,to_char(A.reg_dm,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') REG_DM ,to_char(A.upd_dm,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') UPD_DM ,A.MID ,A.TITLE , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.SCODE AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS SNAME , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_MAN AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS REG_NM , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.UPD_MAN AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS UPD_NM
, (select mem_nm from lf_dmuser.member where mem_no = A.mem_no) MEM_NM
FROM (SELECT A.* ,MPA.MEM_NO FROM TB_MONITORING_ADMIN A
left outer join lf_dmuser.mem_prod_accnt mpa on a.accnt_no=mpa.accnt_no
) A ) A ) A
WHERE PAGE_INDX >= #{startLine} AND PAGE_INDX < #{endLine}
